pageProduct.name: Sambucol Immune Defence Forte High Strength 30 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Sambucol's unique High Strength Immune Defence Forte combines high dose Premium Black Elderberry & Astragalus, 1000 mg Vitamin C per day, Zinc & Vitamin D3 to fight illness & hit colds hard.

Sambucol High Strength Immune Defence Forte helps reduce the severity of Cold & Flu symptoms and reduce Cold & Flu duration so you can get back to being you faster.

- Support Immunes Health to Fight Illness
- Reduce Cold Duration
- Relieve Symptom Severity

Suitable For: Adults

Size: 30 Capsules

Serving Size: 2 capsules daily

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Contains sulfites.

Ingredients

Each Capsule Contains:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderberry) fruit juice dry 81.43mg
equiv. to fresh juice 2.85g
Astragalus membranaceus (Astragalus) root ext. dry conc. 50mg
equiv. to fresh root 1000mg
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 500mg
Zinc (as Zinc Citrate Dihydrate) 12.5mg
Colecalciferol (Vitamin D3) 7.5micrograms (300 IU)

Contains: Each Capsule Contains:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderberry) fruit juice dry 81.43mg
equiv. to fresh juice 2.85g
Astragalus membranaceus (Astragalus) root ext. dry conc. 50mg
equiv. to fresh root 1000mg
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 500mg
Zinc (as Zinc Citrate Dihydrate) 12.5mg
Colecalciferol (Vitamin D3) 7.5micrograms (300 IU)

Allergen Contains: Sulphites

Allergen May Be Present: Null

Allergen Free From: n/a

Directions

Adults: 2 capsules daily
Best taken regularly, or as advised by your health professional.

Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Contains Zinc which may be dangerous if taken in large amounts of for a longer period. Adults only.

Do not use if blister foil is broken. Store below 25°C.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25C. Do not use if blister foil is broken or missing.
